Package com.camerontec.catalys.util.notification

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICatalysEventListener
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of receiving CatalysEventObjects.
    IListenerWrapper
    Listeners can be fronted by other listeners.
    INotifier
    Allows for a general notification to a given listener that a given event has occurred.
    INotifySupport
    All purpose support for event sources.
    ISelectableListenerEntry
    Container for an EventListener together with an ISelector object which determines when that listener is notified.
    ISelectableListenerEntryPredicate
    Defines a functor interface implemented by classes that perform a predicate test on an ISelectableListenerEntry.
    ISelectableListenerEntryVisitor
    Lets clients of the ISelectableNotifySupport interface perform operations on all listeners without having to expose the underlying listener collection.
    ISelectableNotifySupport
    Support for event sources with selectable listeners.
    ISelector
    Used in ISelectableListenerEntry to decide whether a given listener should be notified.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CatalysEventObject
    Base class for all Catalys events representing a EventObject that supports a writable source, time stamping and an integer type.
    DefaultNotifySupport
    Event source support which uses an optional INotifier object to allow for different notification methods and, therefore, different types of selectableListeners.
    ListenerExceptionEntry
    Listener/Exception pair returned by INotifySupport.fireNotify(java.util.EventObject, int).
    ListenerQueue
    Used to decouple the notification of listeners.
    SelectableListenerEntry
    Default implementation of ISelectableListenerEntry.
